name: Innovation Matrix Tool
description:
The innovation matrix tool is a new way to capture all of the emerging ideas within your organization. You can use it...


  1. As a repository of ideas. By condensing all ideas into a single point, you will better focus your future strategy.
  2. As a synthesis tool to gather ideas from meetings and facilitate decision-making procedures. 
  3. As an efficient dynamic for ideation workshops. The tool allows you to easily classify the ideas of any brainstorming or collective workshop.
